usefulItems: parchment paper, airtight container, baking sheets, wire rack, oven
title: Snickerdoodles

ingredients.content: 8 oz unsalted butter, cut into pieces

preparations.content: Preheat oven to 400°F. Line baking sheets with parchment and set aside.
Place 1.5 oz sugar and cinnamon into mixing bowl and mix <b>3 sec/speed 5<b>. Transfer to a bowl and set aside.
Place remaining 10.5 oz sugar into mixing bowl and grind <b>6 sec/speed 10<b>.
Add eggs and mix <b>20 sec/speed 3<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add flour, baking soda, cream of tartar and salt and mix <b>40 sec/speed 4<b>.

Form dough with two teaspoons into walnut-size balls (1½ in.), roll in reserved sugar and cinnamon mixture and place 2 inches apart on prepared baking sheets. Bake one sheet after another for 8-10 minutes (400°F) until cookies are set in the center and begin to crack (they will not brown). Allow to cool for 5 minutes on a wire rack before serving or storing in an airtight container.
